metadata.title: CVE-2019-16394 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SPIP before 3.1.11 and 3.2 before 3.2.5 provides different error messagesfrom the password-reminder page depending on whether an e-mail addressexists, which might help attackers to enumerate subscribers.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
